meanings.definition: Having or consisting of multiple valves.
meanings.sent1: The multivalve engine allowed for better control of the fuel flow.
meanings.sent2: The multivalve system in the heart ensures efficient blood circulation.
meanings.sent3: The multivalve door lock confused the burglars, making it harder for them to break in.
meanings.sent4: Her multivalve mind processed information from different sources simultaneously.
meanings.sent5: The multivalve mechanism in the sprinkler prevented water wastage.

meanings.sent1: The mechanic used a multivalve to regulate the airflow in the engine.
meanings.sent2: The multivalve in the irrigation system controlled the water flow to different sections of the field.
meanings.sent3: The multivalve on the water dispenser made it easy to switch between hot and cold water.
meanings.sent4: The multivalve on the trumpet allowed the musician to produce a range of notes effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The multivalve on the gas cylinder ensured safe and precise control of the gas flow.
